TITLESTMT.TITLE: Johnson Family Papers - New York Pocket Almanac of Edward Savage (Box 7) (1790)
TITLESTMT.AUTHOR: Savage, Edward

NOTESSTMT.NOTE: Digitization by the Digital Consulting and Production Services at Cornell University Library

BIBL.TITLE: Johnson Family Papers - New York Pocket Almanac of Edward Savage (Box 7) (1790)
BIBL.AUTHOR: Savage, Edward

EDITORIALDECL.P: This electronic text was derived from the Encoded Archival Description (EAD) created by the Cornell University Library's Department of Rare and manuscripts . No corrections have been made to the text and no editing has been done to the content of the original document. Structure data and important page features have been identified manually allow easier document navigation.

KEYWORDS.TERM: The Johnson Family Papers consist of correspondence, wills, diplomas, marriage certificates, obituaries, photographs, genealogical notes and family histories, land grant certificates, military documents, a book of autographs, and other papers and documents of the Johnson and related families, direct descendants of the Presidential Adams family. The family was located chiefly in Utica, New York.

DIV1.HEAD: Box 7/Folder 1-New York Pocket Almanac: Edward Savage (1790)
